description:
In order for mom to finish up the manuscript, she told Bunji to go play but you`ll never guess what he did; The day of the deadline - Since grandma wasn`t around, mom had to feed the kids and go to work afterwards. However, she didn`t make their favorite food...; Mom was working all night long and just when she thought she could take a break, Bunji and Fumi catch a cold where mom must nurse them back to health; Bunji, Fumi, and grandma go back to Kochi. Mom was planning on enjoying some alone time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Twist / Just this day! / I can`t take this anymore / A locust`s call
ひと工夫 / この日だけは! / もうイヤ / セミの声
